content: or internet posting instead share link to ravelry or fiftyfourtenstudio com this pattern may be used for personal use charity knitting or small scale craft sales 5 take a sunrise - blanket knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2020 inspiration for pattern name when i planned this blanket design in early february 2020 the name take a sunrise was inspired by a line from a song in a favorite childhood movie who can take a sunrise sprinkle it with dew i started knitting this blanket in early march thankful for a project to keep me busy as news in the world became more and more unsettling within a few days staying at home was the new normal now there are days that i wake up well before dawn and like so many i worry and wonder when things will get better one morning i worked on knitting this orange blanket and watched the sun come up… like it always does… and the name for this blanket design took on new meaning blocking highly recommended i hope that you enjoy using this pattern may before blocking the stockinette stitch areas you find comfort and peace in your knitting were puckered and the blanket looked lumpy and unattractive use this link to see all my tips bit ly/howtoblockknittingblog 6
